Vrep Locomotion Environment¶

This environment is still a WIP, due to the way VREP handles joints and constraints it is. Difficult to restrict 2 degrees of rotational freedom.

class rl_environments.vrep.balancebot_vrep_locomotion.BalanceBotVrepEnvLocomotion(server_addr='127.0.0.1', server_port=19997, scene_path='C:\Program Files\V-REP3\V-REP_PRO\scenes/balance_bot_ram.ttt')[source]¶
compute_reward()[source]¶

Calculates the dense reward for the environment and adds a sparse reward for achieving the goal

If the goal has been achieved a new goal is sampled.

Returns

reward (sparse) + reward (goal_achievement)

reset()[source]¶

Locomotion Reset function

validate_goal()[source]¶

Check if the goal has been reached and maintained for X amount of time.

Returns

boolean, based on wether the goal has been achieved or not.=
